function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Informal signs used to explain the process to customers initially","Impact":"Confusion and misunderstanding among customers, leading to potential violations of social distancing guidelines","Mitigation":"Implement clear and informative signage to communicate the new processes and social distancing guidelines effectively","Technologies":"Digital display boards, mobile apps for real-time updates, multilingual signage","People":"Customers, employees, general public","Owner":"Business owners, management team"},{"Description":"Duct tape used for marking direction of travel and indicating where to stand","Impact":"Unhygienic surfaces that can potentially spread or harbor contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Use alternative, easy-to-clean materials for marking direction and standing locations, implement regular cleaning and disinfection of marked areas","Technologies":"Floor stickers, colored tape, anti-microbial surface coatings","People":"Customers, employees, general public","Owner":"Business owners, cleaning staff, facility management"},{"Description":"Stress reducing comprehension of new information","Impact":"Misunderstanding of social distancing guidelines and new processes, leading to potential non-compliance and increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implement clear and easy-to-follow signage, provide consistent training and communication to employees, offer support for stress management","Technologies":"Digital display boards, interactive kiosks, stress management apps","People":"Employees, customers, general public","Owner":"Business owners, HR department"}]}
